title: Bug 116564 - The title of hyperlink builder should be "Hyperlink Options", but it changes with settings.
OB: When opening the hyperlink builder and reopening it after clicking on 'OK', the title changes to 'www.actuate.com'.
EB: The title of the hyperlink builder should always be 'Hyperlink Options', regardless of any settings changes.
SR:
1. Open the hyperlink builder.
2. Click on 'OK'.
3. Reopen the hyperlink builder.
